DOMU.HEADING.NAME: Josef Hobler
DOMU.PARAGRAPH.DESCRIPTION: I am a young ambitious junior front-end developer who will promote a positive and friendly atmosphere in the team and will perform tasks with the highest commitment.
My personal website serving as a sample of my work.
Project to verify knowledge of programming on a part-time job in <linkProClient>PRO CLIENT</linkProClient>.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH.PROFILE: Motivated and hardworking student looking for employment in practice. Self-confidence, diligence and determination to achieve the best results in the field of web development. Willing to learn new things and improve the habitual ones.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH.STUDY: I am studying for the last year at the <linkGyza>high school in Zábřeh na Moravě</linkGyza>
SKILLS.HEADING.NAME: Primary technologies
HABITS.PARAGRAPH.0: I like web development because it allows me to create things and contribute to society that way. I'm getting better every day and I don't plan to stop.
HABITS.PARAGRAPH.1: I've been snowboarding since I was a kid and despite countless injuries, I go snowboarding with a smile on my face.
HABITS.PARAGRAPH.2: For the third year in a row I have been visiting the fitness center, where I improve my physical condition and clear my mind.
HABITS.PARAGRAPH.3: I enjoy studying crypto, blockchain, individual ecosystems and exploring the concepts that evolve from these technologies.
HABITS.PARAGRAPH.4: I am improving in all areas of my life and actively looking for the best ways to achieve my goals as efficiently as possible.
HABITS.PARAGRAPH.5: I have always loved logical thinking my entire life, and since I learned to program, I can't stop myself doing it.
HABITS.PARAGRAPH.6: I have always excelled in mathematics and won several school competitions, but it wasn't until high school that I was captivated by math.
